training-levels.name: first training level
dialogue: Tower Team is cooperative game about working together to get to the top of the tower.  To do so, puzzles must be solved.
Every floor has a golden monkey statue. To reach the next floor, you must assemble the statue in the correct order.  Only then will the stairs to the next floor open.
Find all of the golden monkey statue pieces and assemble them at the base.

training-levels.name: boulder training level
dialogue: You'll need to work together to move the boulder blocking this path
